name: Abigail Foreman
description: The number of gates that can be open at once before the Ancient One awakens is reduced by 1.

name: Brian Burnham
description: Only 1 Clue token can be placed on the Feds Raid Innsmouth track per turn.

name: Doctor Mintz
description: After an investigator pays to restore his Sanity to its maximum value at Arkham Asylum, he loses 1 Stamina.

name: Doyle Jeffries
description: Place the 3 Riot monsters in their starting areas.

name: Father Michael
description: Blessings are discarded during the Upkeep phase on a roll of 1-5.

name: Gladys Pickman
description: When a rift activates, draw and place 1 monster token in the rift's new location.

name: Harney Jones
description: The monster limit is lowered by 1 and Harney Jones' Shack is closed for the rest of the game.

name: Joe Osborn
description: When exhausting an item (not including Spells), roll a die. On a failure, discard the item.

name: Joe Sargent
description: When investigators draw Innsmouth Look cards, they draw 1 additional card.

name: Joey "The Rat"
description: If the Ancient One awakens, the investigators need one extra success to remove each doom token during the battle.

name: Jonas Rigg
description: All monsters that move normally now move like Aquatic monsters.

name: Ma Mathison
description: Discard all Allies from play.  Ma's Boarding House is closed for the rest of the game.

name: Miriam Beecher
description: The Sanity cost of all spells is increased by 1.

name: Nurse Sharon
description: After an investigator pays to restore his Stamina to its maximum value at St. Mary's Hospital, he loses 1 Sanity.

name: Principal Miles
description: When an investigator gains 2 or more Clue tokens at once, he is delayed.

name: Oliver Thomas
description: The cost to seal gates is increased by 1 Clue token.

name: Sheriff Engle
description: Return the Deputy cards to the box, even if an investigator has them.  Lower the Outskirts limit by 2 (minimum 0).

name: The Dean
description: Choose and discard 1 Elder Sign token from the board.  Investigators may only refresh 1 card each during Upkeep.

name: The Shopkeeper
description: The list price of all items is increased by $3 when buying them.

name: Velma
description: The terror level is increased by 1 (triggering another Yellow Sign).
